text_block_list.text:
Races are what battles of speed are known as. Where vigorous 
clashes occur, everyone competing for fractions of a second.

However now, as if she was in a world of her own, 
there ran an Uma Musume solemnly on the turf.
Haa… haa… haa
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
choice_data_list: <size=38>(She looks like she's having so much fun…)</size>
<size=38>(She looks like she's having so much fun…)</size>

text_block_list.text:
Those were the first words that came to mind 
when I first saw her, Silence Suzuka
Haa… Haa… hehe…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Even though it was night on her day off and this wasn't training, 
she still continued running the course at an amazing speed…
Huuu… Yeah… running at night is great, it's nice and quiet
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Now that I think about it, doesn't it seem 
like the stars are brighter tonight?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: …hehe. This scenery, I have it all to myself
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: …huh?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Um… do you need something from me…?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
choice_data_list: <size=30>No, just thought you were having a lot of fun out there</size>
<size=30>No, just thought you were having a lot of fun out there</size>

text_block_list.text: O-oh… is that so?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Um… sorry, I'll be off then. I'm 
going to go run for a bit more…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Saying that, Silence Suzuka ran off. It seems like 
even after all that, she still wanted to run…

With frightening speed and an unmatched boundless joy for 
running, she left a deeply striking impression.
I met that Silence Suzuka again several days later

It was the day of the Selection Races. A full-scale 
event where Uma Musume gather to display their 
full power to prospective trainers

So quick! Silence Suzukaaa!! She's ahead 5 Lengths…6 
lengths…7 lengths and even further!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: Haa… haaa… haaa…!
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
W-what a girl… Silence Suzuka…! Does she intend 
to run at top speed all the way to the end?!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Her legs should be getting tired, however… she's so far ahead, 
the other girls can't catch up…!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B

text_block_list.text:
Finally we're entering the last leg, the lead is narrowing but, 
Silence Suzuka is still in the lead! Will she hold on?!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: I won't give up the lead… to anyone!
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka, finishes! She easily finishes 
first, leaving everyone behind!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
The competitors and voices of the crowd were all irrelevant. In 
front of that running form… anyways, it was overwhelming!
Huuu…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
choice_data_list: (By all means, I want to scout her…!)
(By all means, I want to scout her…!)

text_block_list.text: But, of course I wasn't the only one thinking that

Suzuka! That race was splendid! Could 
I speak with you for a moment?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B

text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah… um… Okay.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
You have a wonderful pair of legs. But, 
you can still become even faster!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B

text_block_list.text: Even faster…? Is that true?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Yes. Just now was superb, but there are parts where 
you're still relying only on your own talent.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B

text_block_list.text:
If you so desire, I can properly teach how to run! 
That way, you can take the lead in any race!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B

text_block_list.text: Take the lead in any race…?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: …understood. I accept.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
How disappointing. Scouting aside, I wasn't even able to properly 
speak to her before it was over…
And then, sometime later

One day while stopping by the library, I 
spotted Silence Suzuka and Air Groove.

For instantaneous power what's necessary is anaerobic energy, and 
for endurance it's aerobic energy.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Anaerobic energy has a limit. Therefore, pacing yourself and 
determining when exactly to use this is essential.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
So at the beginning of the race, you limit your speed to save 
energy for acceleration later…?
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Yeah. In regards to races, that's the theory.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
I knew that was a style of running but… to think there was a 
proper theory and reason behind it…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Thanks, Air Groove. For taking the time to walk me through it.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: I don't mind, but…
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
But that's rare, Suzuka. Someone like you who's good at leading 
from the start asking about this.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: Y-yeah. Just curious.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Anyways, before I forget this, I'm going for 
a quick run. See you again, Air Groove.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Yeah…
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Theory… in other words, correct… right? Yeah, it'll be 
fine… if I just run like they taught me…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: It'll be fine. Definitely, I'll be able to see a better scene…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Deep down I thought she was lying to 
herself, and it really bothered me.
